A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely phenomenal film. Rian Johnson's vision for this episode takes Star Wars into a place it has yet to go before. It challenges the audience to question accepted truths in Jedi lore and the Star Wars universe overall. It's different\, it's exciting\, and it's certainly not a copy of Empire. I shave off half a star only because the arc with Finn and Rose was unnecessary and ultimately would have shaved off a needed 20 minutes of film.
